study.title: Mindfulness-Based Cognitive Therapy for Suicide Prevention

front_details.question: Did mindfulness meditation plus suicide safety planning (MBCT-S) improve suicide events in high-risk Veterans compared to VA usual care after 12 months?
front_details.intervention_fragment: mindfulness meditation plus suicide safety planning (MBCT-S)
front_details.intervention_group_fragment: high-risk Veterans (VA High Risk for Suicide List)
front_details.outcome_fragment: suicide events (attempts, preparatory acts, or suicidal thoughts needing emergency care)

front_details.question: Did a very low-calorie diet (VLCD) improve striatal dopamine D2 receptor binding in obese participants after the diet compared to baseline after 8–10 days?
front_details.outcome_fragment: striatal dopamine D2 receptor binding (DRD2 BP)
front_details.comparator_group_fragment: the same obese participants at baseline

study.title: Treadmill Training vs Stretching After Stroke

front_details.question: Did treadmill training increase daily energy expenditure vs stretching in stroke survivors at 6 months?
Did exposure therapy reduce CAPS-IV scores at 3-month follow-up in combat-related PTSD?

study.title: CBT for Chronic Low Back Pain

front_details.question: Did CBT improve Roland-Morris disability score at 9 months in chronic low back pain?
front_details.intervention_group_fragment: patients with chronic low back pain

front_details.question: Did Mediterranean diet supplemented with olive oil reduce major cardiovascular events compared to low-fat diet at 5 years?
front_details.intervention_fragment: Mediterranean diet with extra virgin olive oil

front_details.question: Did a smartphone app with mood tracking reduce PHQ-9 depression scores compared to waitlist control at 3 months?
front_details.intervention_fragment: smartphone app with mood tracking and CBT modules
front_details.intervention_group_fragment: adults with mild to moderate depression

front_details.question: Did high-intensity interval training improve peak VO2 compared to moderate continuous training in heart failure patients at 12 weeks?
front_details.intervention_group_fragment: patients with heart failure with reduced ejection fraction
